alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 22 at 10:32AM EST until January 23 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Carolina...South Carolina... Lumber River Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County. Great Pee Dee River At Pee Dee affecting Marion and Florence Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lumber River near Lumberton. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Low land flooding will occur along the river. The flood waters may affect some residential property as water backs up into the drainage ditches in the city. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:20 AM EST Monday the stage was 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.0 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by late tonight.
